Name: Atomorf2
About the game: Atomorf2 is a story about a robot, he lives in a radioactive world. Levels are silos with many dangerous moving obstacles. Atomorf loves radiation and collects plutonium, but is afraid of sharp objects. Features: Rotation of the entire level. Plutonium collection. Convenient management. Progress. References to the periodic table! Â  Differences from the first part of the Atomorf game: No weapons. Levels are bigger and harder.
